website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable car seat with a realistic looking Iron Man character that kids are going to love.
pros: Iron Man's hands wrap around the 3 cup holders, which gives the car seat a fun look
Contains a high back and extra padding for comfort during long car rides
Uses a 3-position headrest so you can match it to fit your child of 30-100 pounds
cons: Not as much padding in the seat area
Chest clip may slide down the harness

customer_reviews.title: I love my new car seat" seeing him so happy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo son loves this car seat, it's totally safe in it, he's a tall 5 yo and he fit in it perfectly! he says "mommy I'm very very comfortable" He actually buckle it up himself. I just come in to check as a routine. Everytime he enters the car, he goes.. " Wow!!! mommy, I love my new car seat" seeing him so happy, makes me happy! Now, For me, This car seat literarily creeps me out. When my son isn't in it and I'm driving, I keep thinking there is someone behind me wearing a spiderman costume. lol This is how real it looks! other than that.. it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Maud

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay tightly installed!
customer_reviews.text: Will NOT stay tightly installed!! I tried using both the latch and the seatbelt system and I could easily move this seat all over he place! My son was heartbroken. I have installed many many car seats and never have this problem. I have a 2016 Honda pilot so it is not an old car. My daughter wanted the cinderella one and now she is upset because we won't be getting that either. Will sadly be returning this and have a very sad little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M Presper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son loves having a Spider-Man seat, but mom is less impressed. Doesn't fasten to the car securely, I have the strap as tight as it will go and it still slides. Button to tighten the 5-point harness straps also not very easy to use, my son is 31 lbs and no matter how much I try to tighten the harness it stays loose. Not very confident in seat safety and considering returning
customer_reviews.author: Veritas M

customer_reviews.title: Best of all
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old grandson visiting us and the United States for the first time. The look on his face on first look was unforgettable and he never complained about sitting with Spiderman when it was time to go. Best of all; the superior quality materials, solid construction and intuitive features. We highly recommend the few extra dollars paid to satisfy the boy and us. Thank you. Susan and Lex Los Angeles, CA
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dion

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this car seat. It’s just garbage. The straps do NOT pull tight enough. They loosen. The chest strap slides down constantly. Safety features are not up to par. I do not suggest this car seat to anyone. This company should be ashamed at the quality of this car seat. You should care more about children and make something that can help save their lives in the event of a car accident.
customer_reviews.author: Qasim Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, love it!
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research on the next car seat for our 3 year old, and this was the winner. The Graco Nautilus 3-in-1 had the highest ratings on Consumer Reports, and this one was comparable in all categories except ease of installation. But seriously, what carseat is truly easy to install? This has seat anchor latches which makes it as easy as any would be, so no complaints there. Shipping was fast and it showed up a few days early which was a nice surprise for our little Spiderman lover. The quality was better than expected and we are very pleased. Definitely recommended for any super hero lover!
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old can unbuckle himself
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car seat I however do not. One it doesn’t seem tight on the seat. I put the seat bell around it for extra support and my son can unbuckle himself. I’m hoping I can still return this and get another character the Batman one I did not have that problem. I was in a car wreak and that one had to be disposed. Therefore we got the Spider-Man. Very disappointed. I can’t trust it or him.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - dangerous
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would. I am not sure if there is an upgrades model, but the model above is a complete piece of junk. It's unsafe, found that out in an accident, it's all plastic, and it's not what is described. I even had a fireman put mine in because I thought I was doing wrong, and he said it's unsafe. It's my only car seat since I threw my older one away, and now I have to buy a new one because I'm petrified to put my 3 year old in this. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom D.

customer_reviews.title: Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cadillac CTS so I would suggest installing this car seat on the passenger side versus the middle seat to get the best secure seat. I also had to adjust the anchor clamps to a higher point in the seat so that it would have a snug fit. I haven’t had the problem with the chest strap falling. I think the seat is comfortable because my has sleep in it during long road trips (7 hours) with no problem. Overall I love this seat and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Syreeta Reid

customer_reviews.title: Spiderman is a HIT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three and a half year old grandson. He loves it. Great comfort in the build of this car seat. It is comfortable and even his little brother wants one now!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Karabela

customer_reviews.title: You have a little superhero in your life, you need one of these!!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my four-year-old son. He is so happy and so in love with them! I don't have to fight with him to get him to get into his car seat. The only difficult part is the arm sticking out does make it a little awkward for him to climb in. He thinks he is a big boy now because he has two cup holders. It's also got extra cushion and super easy to install safely. Only negative thing I can say is very funny actually.... At 5 in the morning at the gas station it scared the crap out of me thinking somebody was sitting in my backseat! But I still recommend it!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tpederson11

customer_reviews.title: Safe ,well built,glad I saw it before I bought another safe but boring carseat
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for new car seat for my almost 4 yr old Grandson not quite ready for booster ,when I saw this read all safety standards that it meets and goes beyond and showed it to him it was ordered.came on time the mail lady said it was the talk of the post office never knew them made these VERY COOL ! I picked my Grandson up and didn’t tell him it was in my car opened the door and Wow ! Safe is my #1 goal but after that doing special things for him is what I m about .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Seats
customer_reviews.text: There was a mixup with my youngest grandson (Candyman). Dad was left with the baby car seat, which he outgrown. Looking for one for my son car to replace I came across these themed seats. Now, the oldest grand just turned 6 and didn’t want to sit in a seat any longer don’t mind getting in and buckling up. Spider-Man was going to be for (Candyman) then I saw they had Mickey and got him one also. Not even worried about extra seat because they’re always being switched in and out and left in one car or another between family🤣
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this seat. The straps can be a little wacky but that's your typical carseat anyways. The arm rest can be annoying trying to get a sleeping toddler out and over them. Also, the seat took some getting use to being in my car because you can take a glance and mistake it for someone sitting in your car lol.. I've gotten some good scares from it!
customer_reviews.author: Qween

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing that is has cup holders because he can bring ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his spiderman carseat, it is amazing that is has cup holders because he can bring his waters and won't have to ask me over and over to hand back his water. The seat belt hole in the back is kind of small, I have pretty petite hands and it is difficult for me to grab the seat belt through, there is also only one latch to give extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and meets safety regulations
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my 4 year old grandson. I have had so many people say how cool these seats are. In fact couple people are buying them for their kids. I got the hulk too for the other grandson. He doesn’t want to get out of the car seat. Very well Made and sturdy. I had my daughter approve them For safety before I purchased. I highly recommend these. I didn’t want to have to get those huge bully car seats that are so expensive. This were the perfect purchase for toddlers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana LeSieur

customer_reviews.title: Great, reliable car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old is super into spider man. He still needed a 5 point harness and I wanted something that would grow with him. I came across this and immediately thought my son would be ecstatic. It’s durable, not wobbly like major brand high back boosters so even after he’s outgrown the 5 point harness, he will continue to use this as a high back booster and the material is thicker, yet the car seat isn’t bulky. The design is high quality and my other kiddo wanted to claim it as hers, haha! Maybe I’ll get another character one so they can match.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Overall love it..so far  since I just recently purchased it
customer_reviews.text: My lil one loves it she just had a spiderman bday and this just finished off her surprise...she does not want to get out of it...and loves her cup holders..colors are bright and look exactly like ke spiderman....also purchased the Hulk Carseat ..will give review once I set it up for my lil man.
customer_reviews.author: moya

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and perfect for spidey fans
customer_reviews.text: This the coolest safety seat iv ever laid my eyes on. My nephew was so excited. I am surprised that This package was able to come before it's delivery date. Easy to assemble and perfect for spidey fans. #webpower #spideymann #thecoolestforthecoolest THANK YOU AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: angelica ramos

customer_reviews.title: Happiest two year old ever!
customer_reviews.text: I drive a F-150 so it’s roomy in the back. This seat fits perfect. The headrest does not sit too high. The safety strap is no harder than any other to install than any other new style seat. The picture I have posted shows my only dislike. I swore someone was in my back seat the next morning going to work. Now I know I’m safe with Spider-Man watching over me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Kid & Parent approved!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Superman fanatic & this carseat is so perfect for him! His old one felt so crammed, this gives him so much more room & adorable cup holders! I strapped it to my back middle seat & it is in there incredibly snug. That thing is NOT budging. I feel very confident that he will be kept safe with this car seat! The straps also fit really nicely on him & they are super easy to adjust (thank goodness) when needed. It's everything I could have hoped for in a car seat. Definitely recommend this or other princess/hero ones like this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Our second one!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old son outgrew his car seat so I purchased a Batman one by this manufacturer. We liked the first one so much I got this one. Kids love iit and t it is also SO much easier to install than the previous closed hook type we had before. We ONLY use it with the harness though (it's not as safe with just seat belts) for his age and size (41 lbs). I think this seat is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: muskie1

customer_reviews.title: Safe and son LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES his car seat! He asks to sit in his “Spider-Man” seat. It’s super cute. However when my son isn’t t in the car I forget about it and think someone is in the backseat, but then I remember it’s just Spider-Man. LOL!!! 😂 The seat came together so no need to put anything together and it was easy to install with the tether setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son was obsessed with SpiderMan so I got him this car seat. It looks just as amazing as the picture does. It would seem to be easy to install but we can never get it tight enough to the seat so it doesn’t tip over. We tried it in my husbands car, my van my moms SUV, it wasn’t sturdy in any of them. I ended up ordering another car seat because this one just isn’t safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hodge

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4yrs old and about 3ft+ this car seat is perfect I was going to get the booster but decided he was still to fidgety and I feel safer with him in modern car seat. We love spiderman and he was over the moon happy. He still has a lot of room for adjusting. Don't let the price tag scare you it's worth the 150. Wish I would've gotten it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: uncoolmom00

customer_reviews.title: Cool careseat but does not feel secure/safe
customer_reviews.text: This a a really cool car seat that gets a lot of attention. It does not seem sturdy. The top straps are always sliding down even when tightened. The middle strap between the legs is short so that area is tight. We just do not feel like this is a secure car seat. I would not purchase one again
customer_reviews.author: E N

customer_reviews.title: Super hero aspect done really well for being a car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is our first big kid car seat so still getting used to having less protection but quick research found it had good safety ratings. Very well made for being a super hero theme and my son LOVES it. Son was begging for a second hero in my car but Read that it can be uncomfortable in long car rides so nixed the idea to get one non-hero comfortable one for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: tbumble

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for spiderman lovers
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. We literally took it out of the box, adjusted the straps to fit and then clipped the straps to the car seat anchors that are already in almost all newer cars. We have had this car seat for a few months now and no fading of colors or bunching up of the straps. Also it is easy to take out and remove the cover for washing. Big bonus when it comes to toddlers who spill everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase for my toddler because he was at a stage where he didn’t want to get in the car seat. Now he’s always happy to sit on spiderman. It is very sturdy, easy to install and fabric colors and finishes are really good. I only wish it was invented before when I had my other children cause it would have solved so many fights about being in the carseat!
customer_reviews.author: Tish

customer_reviews.title: Practically perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I love the quick release option on the tether straps!! Our family always shifts car seats around depending who is watching the kids for us and this one is perfect! Easy adjustable shoulder straps, dual cup holders, perfect amount of padding with not too much but not cheap, head rest adjustable, head tether as well as the ones below the seat, back booster seat option. AND ITS SPIDERMAN! I'm not kidding when I say my son gets in the car faster knowing he enjoys it saying "piderman gives me hug" AND spiderman holds his drinks for him! I dont regret this purchase at all and no lie Im usually picky when it come to car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the easiest car seats to install and hook my child in. I feel most car seats are not designed for women with long fingernails. This one I can do easily without breaking a nail. Some moms will appreciate this. My child loves it and says it’s comfortable. The only drawback is when you get in your car at night alone and glance in your rear view mirror , you get a slight heart attack because of the face looking back at you.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but may lack some comfort
customer_reviews.text: My little boy thinks his SM seat is awesome! The price was good, safety was great, and this will serve as an awesome #2 car seat. It looks to be comfy for daily commute, but doesnt recline, so I wouldn't recommend it for long trips. Overall a good deal on a cool looking seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Spider-Man car seat.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fun look of this car seat! However, as cute & bright as it is; that does not make up for its downfalls. The straps constantly twist, leg straps metal clip get stuck While locking making it hard to lock completely or unlock! My grandson says it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Young

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it fits nicely and I have no trouble with the straps
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it fits nicely and I have no trouble with the straps. I like how it is designed my son can put his snacks,drink and toy cars in the cup holders and when he falls asleep his head can lean to the side unlike his other car seat where he tilts forward and I have to keep pushing him back so he not falling out the seat. My son loves spiderman every time he sees something with spiderman he gets excited and yells its Spiderman.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jerzy

customer_reviews.title: Best carseat for Boys
customer_reviews.text: Coolest carseat around. I cant get over how nice it is. The colors are so bright and material is amazing. Everyone asks me where I got his super cool car seat. I bought it cause I saw it in a parked car one day and thought it was so cool that my boy had to get one to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sutt

customer_reviews.title: Best.Gram.Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This item is what the best Grammy in the world gets her 3yr grandson. Yep, it’s me! 4 star for install as it took my son in law 15 min in 90 degree weather to install in said Grammys car. Grandsons parents let him ride in it, so it must be safe; as they are rather sticky about safety.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Dunn

customer_reviews.title: No cushion for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this seat. My son was so excited for his Spider-Man car seat! However, after rising in it any time for more than 40 minutes he would begin to whine that his butt hurt. After 2 hours he would be crying. We don’t travel super often but enough that after a few months we have to buy him a new seat with more cushion. He’s absolutely heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Slaven

customer_reviews.title: Safety and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Its important to me to have my grandson as comfortable as possible when he rides with me in my truck, he LOVES this new Spiderman booster seat. It sits up so he can see outside and the says its really comfortable to sit in. I had a few issues putting the head piece on, but once we got it on he sat in it and watched TV for the longest time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clemens

customer_reviews.title: I like 3 things about this car seat
customer_reviews.text: I like 3 things about this car seat. It has a kid friendly design, cup holders, and is slim in width for when I need 3 available seats. I do not like that my son is not comfortable how it sits, the Styrofoam seat, my son can not sleep without a neck cramp, and it is horrible to disassemble and clean. If you have a kid in diapers or deal with motion sickness this is not the car seat for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Feels secure
customer_reviews.text: Love the LATCH install and the shoulder padding for the straps. We are using the 5 point harness right now, I'm glad to find that on a larger seat. My son loves it. The cup holders are a nice feature. I hope I never have to update this with a performance review, but I do feel it is a nice secure seat if something were to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Middendorf

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We love these products so much that we own 3 of these seats. Every time one of our children get big enough for one, this is the first purchase we make! We have Batman, Leonardo, and Spider-Man. My kids love them and in the 4 years we’ve had these products, I’ve never once had any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Eight months new and chest clip broken already !
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is absolutely adorable. Purchased on July 23, 2016, today is April 13, 2017. The chest clip broke over a month ago and I had to pay $12.50 for a new one which still isn't here so the car seat is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie0531

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is ok. Main complaint is the bottom buckle is WAY too narrow! I had to move it to the furthest one out, and still my 3 year old has to push his bottom back hard against the back of the chair. After 6 months of having it, he finally is scooting back naturally instead of me helping. If it is not ankered it tilts... I just probably wouldn't reccomend or buy again for the comfort level for my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Presssmom

customer_reviews.title: Very Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely terrific! My son is in love with his carseat. Its very slim design and very soft and comfortable for my 4 yr old. The headrest slides up and down to adjust for height as well! Easy assembly and installation as well! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Walters

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put in the car but my son loves it very colorful very soft very comfortable my son absolutely loves the cupholders I took them a ride in it yesterday and he couldn’t stop staring through the windows he loves it because he could see everything highly recommend it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FOUR HOURS TO INSTALL AND IT STILL ISNT SECURE!
customer_reviews.text: I give UP! Apparently you can't install this car seat using the car's anchors if your kid is over 45 lbs. My son, almost 5, is right at 46 lbs so I had to use the seat belt method. THIS CAR SEAT WILL NOT INSTALL SECURELY IF YOU ARE USING A SEAT BELT!!! Why not use a booster, you may ask? Because he won't sit still and isn't ready for the booster! I will NEVER buy one of these car seats again and, unless something magical occurs, I will be returning this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Novelty wore off quickly
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the idea of a Spider-Man car seat, until we took a 3 hour drive to Tahoe. There is ZERO cushion on the seat. Honestly, it feels like a stadium bleacher. Couple that with the poor harness tightening design (you have to take the cover off to really tighten it down and the material is cheap and folds over itself making it even harder to tighten) and this thing is going in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Great for Spider-man fans!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 yr old grandson and he absolutely loved it. He’s a big Spider-Man fan and this couldn’t of been a more perfect gift. It has a great harness set up for buckling him in, the back is nice and high and the cup holders are a good size. It was easy to install into the car. The material is good and sturdy and the color is nice and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki H.

customer_reviews.title: Great prize, comfortable & easly to install.
customer_reviews.text: I love everthing about my son car seat & so does he. I don't have to worry about spills because of the cup holder, he love getting in it so its never a fix when buckling him in. It was very eady to install, my son is so comfortable that he take naps in it. I love how far the straps adjust, it makes it easy for when the weather changes and him wearing his winter coat. Great buy & great prize
customer_reviews.author: Sinquetta

customer_reviews.title: Good look but not child proof
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we ( me and my family) love the way it looks, we have Spider-Man and its awesome it’s a great seat glad I purchased it. However the reason I gave my seat 4 stars For safety is because my 4 year old son can undo the chest clasp and the seatbelt locking mechanism between his legs he just pushes in the red button and whlah he is able to take himself out if his seat.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: Kid Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a work of art. It is safe, easy to install and makes the kid happy. Really wish they had the Venom version. It would match my car a lot better. Or even the Dark night version of the Batman seat instead of the flamboyant blue and gray version. Anyway kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old (he’s tall for his age) and we LOVE this car seat! My favorite thing about it is it came pretty much ready to install in my vehicle. I had to adjust some straps to height and put the Spider-Man head in but it was easy. And the latches that latch into the vehicle have an easier release than our last car seat so it’s not a 30 minute fight to move seats to another vehicle. Very comfy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katy D.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loveeed it! He only wants to ride the car that has this carseat on it, he doesnt care about his other carseat anymore. He feels comfortable and he has more space. Its safe wich its a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: It hard to install but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This seat is in no means easy to install. But my son loves it. He climbs in and out of it with no problem and when he tries to get out we tell him "spidey cant protect you if you don't sit in your chair." And it works every time! Now I just need to buy another one for our youngest who crys because he want to sit in spidey.
customer_reviews.author: Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Short Buckle Strap
customer_reviews.text: My four year old son needed a new car seat. The strap and buckle between his legs needs to be longer. We bought two and both are tight in buckling him in. The seat belt straps are fine, it’s the piece that fits between his legs. If not careful, you will pinch his legs when securing him in the seat. I wish we would have kept the other car seats or selected a different seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: This is the best seat ever
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his seat!!! This is the best seat ever. I love how tight it is in my car, there is no space for it moving. He knows how to buckle himself and unbuckle which is helpful, and I love that he will buckle the top buckle, in his seat before this one he would refuse to let me buckle the chest part, so I am guessing this one is much more comfortable for him! I highly recommend this seat! Plus the company and their customer service is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: polarbear77

customer_reviews.title: Terrible latch system
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited to get these car seats. I pulled them out of the box and saw the latch system is different. It sure is a lot easier to get latched and unlatched than the regular kind. But as I am installing this with the latch system, I shake it to the left and right (to make sure it’s tight enough) and the damn thing comes unlatched!!! If I had not checked it and was to get in an accident, my children could have been killed. This is unacceptable. I do not recommend anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Needs SAFTY  improvement
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to use the strap that goes betwee the legs. It is too close yo the back of the seat and does not work for my 4 years old . It swill hardly work for babies.. This really needs to be corrected!! Yael Lir
customer_reviews.author: Yael Lir

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat. Perfect for our picky, car seat hating son!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute car seat. My son loves it and doesn’t fight to get into the car seat anymore. He is very sensitive to the way things feel and being constrained. It is comfortable and easy to get my son in and out of the seat. I’m very happy we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Barlas Yuce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and so did the rest of the family. He sits comfortably in it and I feel reassured while driving. It doesn't have amazing memory foam padding, but that's not why I bought it. It has decent padding and makes my son want to sit in it for extended drives, while being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car seat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome car seat! We had our (45 lbs) 7 year old twins in booster seats and they kept sliding out of the seat belt and throwing tantrums. I went back to this type of seat and they love them. I feel much more comfortable knowing they are cooperating and buckled properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Cushion!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not great for long distances, my 4 year old complains of it being hard. It is nice to look at. The sticker at the chest clip is cheap and not worth crap. I would've preferred no sticker. It is easily ruined and looks ugly once it gets messed up.
customer_reviews.author: BayKakes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT... I just only wish the bottom buckle adjusted
customer_reviews.text: Best car seat we have purchased for our 4 year old son! We even bought two, spiderman and Ironman! We have no regret! We also love when he falls asleep in his car seat, his head does not bobble too much and his head doesn’t lean forward. I do wish the buckle at the bottom had adjustments. When my son grows a little more, I can not adjust the buckle and I don’t know what to do because us as parents and our son just LOVE these car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No cushion, very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year can’t ride in it for more than 45 minutes without his bottom hurting and lower back. There is absolutely no cushion in the seat and the low back area. We have had to stop on longer trips to take breaks and it’s very healed to convince him to get back in so we can get going again. I wish I could return it. Don’t buy this brand until they fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: rian ladd

customer_reviews.title: pricey but comfy
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because its waaayyy wayyyy over priced i had to think about it for 2 weeks before purchasing smh but anyways its a nice comfortable carseat
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and kids love crawling into it!
customer_reviews.text: We have the privilege of picking up our grandson once a week to take him to preschool. My son spent $300 each for his two car seats, and they are so boring. He said it took him 90 minutes to install. This one took about 2 minutes, and I knew NOTHING about installing car seats! There is a latch in the front to loosen the 5 point harness to make it fit our 50# 3 y/o, and had to release the whole car seat to figure it out, but it was so easy to put back in place.
customer_reviews.author: Maybach_007

customer_reviews.title: Crotch strap is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I hated this. My 4 year old LOVES Spiderman and was so excited to get this. He was jumping up and down like crazy. But WHY is the crotch strap so far back?? It only has 2 options on where it goes. It squishes his manhood and is so uncomfortable for him, and he hasn't even reached the height or weight requirements for this seat! It was a pain in the ass to try and adjust and I'm not sure I feel good about him being in the car in it. 😠
customer_reviews.author: mikaelap

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand son and he loves it. This will be the last car seat I will ever have to buy for him since it will fit him until he is out of a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: I believe it was the best gift they received because they are in them everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Spider man and the Batman carseats. We gave them to our grandboys at Christmas and they were absolutely thrilled with them! I believe it was the best gift they received because they are in them everyday and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my son is in love with it. Secondly, it’s light weight, Easy to install and decent size. It’s a little cheaper made (simple and basic) then expected but not bad. Happy with my purchase, Only downfall- my child can still undo the buckle :(
customer_reviews.author: Jess Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Supper happy.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this. My 3yr old is elated and they didn’t skimp it n any safety or quality features so I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family Loves these we bought Batman and Superman! Just be careful when you get in the car Bat man scares the crap out of me every time! 😃
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: We love Spider-Man
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old cant wait to get into my Jeep now. He loves his new seat and it fits my seat in my 2017 wrangler perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Double Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, Mama approved
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my son’s car seat, and he loves it! I was a little hesitant to buy after reading some reviews that said their child unstrapped themselves. But I haven’t had any issues, it’s very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Irving

customer_reviews.title: Missing safety features
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate security or comfort as we are unable to install. The carseat only came with ONE of the 2 hooks to secure it to the seat. After reading reviews (which I should have done before), we will be returning for a different seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that my son loves. Easy to install and really comfortable for my son. He loves spiderman and im glad its back on stock
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Get the Batman one instead
customer_reviews.text: My son did not like this one. He complained that it was too tight and spidermans face has a foam part that extenda down to his back which also bothered him. He has the Batman car seat and no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Sarkis Kaladzhyan

customer_reviews.title: Lower Buckle very set back
customer_reviews.text: we love this car seat, but the buckle on the bottom is set back where it is very snug on my sons crotch and he is not comfortable for a long car ride. And no, there is not a way to adjust it we even had a law enforcement officer assist us.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I don't know who loves this car ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I don't know who loves this car seat more... My daughter or me! Fits her perfectly, easy in and easy out. Colors of Spider-Man are gorgeous. Love the cup holders, love how she can sit up without being "bent" like some car seats. And love that it turns into a booster. Big WIN.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Carseat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2.5 yr. old who loves spiderman. He loves this car seat. This car seat is very cute. I like the harness strap and the two cup holders. The back part where Spiderman's head is, can extend up for taller or older children.
customer_reviews.author: terah

customer_reviews.title: Dont think it's as good as others but my son likes it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool carseat, however it is not comfortable and it is pretty cheap. The harness strap buckle is made of very thin cheap plastic as the rest of carseat. It does not have enough padding and sometimes the buckles do not go in the crotch buckle. I'm very disappointed that I cannot write to the seller as there is n option to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson # 2 Now he has spider man and hulk He’s 3 It is perfect Cup holders Both sides Very sturdy Got to be great We bought 2 different characters
customer_reviews.author: Billie Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Big pilot seat with good support and cup holder
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that my children didn't want to get in to the new nanny's car and bought this and ninja turtle. My children love these! Big and comfy. Got room for my daughter's big stuffed cat and sippy cup. It sits in the car like a big pilot chair, not reclined back that gets my son nauseous in a long drive. Good head support for them to nap and perfect for watching movie in the back!
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. My lil granddaughter loves dressing up as Spidergirl. She was so excited to ride in grandma and pappy's car in this car seat. Perfect construction. Comfortable head support. Alliws my granddaughter to see out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Creepy45

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but will update
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new seat.we haven’t installed or used it yet but will up date review afterwards It came mostly assembled I just had to click on the head rest. The product was shipped in the original box and was damaged but the product was fine and inside a undamaged plastic bag. Overall it looks nice and seems sturdy and is around 20 lbs lighter than my sons old seat. It doesn’t recline
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth Deffenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, fun, safe seat. A little wide at the base.
customer_reviews.text: I have actually bought this chair twice because of a car accident. We love the look and the fact that it is nice and safe. It is a tad wider than I would like do to the armrests. I have two in the back row of my Chrysler Town and Country and there is no way that anyone else could sit back there. I would not recommend this seat if you need 3 across, or if you have very limited space. We love ours though.
customer_reviews.author: Aria W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My son ( 4 years old) constantly unbuckles himself while the car is in motion using this car seat. He can easily loosen his straps. The height options are either too short or too high. The seat also causes him to slouch. I would not recommend this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, easy for grandma
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his new carseat and so do I. Super easy to install. Cant really rate the safety features as I haven't done the research, but my daughter in law approved it so I assume it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: jgus66

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and safe!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the comfort of this car seat. The part where he places his bum is cushiony which makes for better support! He loves the design and feels like a big boy with all of the mommy approved safety!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelle Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a great buy. I think its easy to clean and manage. Although the safety features do make me question the actual belts. Its easy for my son to get out of the bekt clips which make me ponder the strength needed to keep him locked in in any type of accident (God for bid)... thats the only thing I dont seem to care for, other than that, nice seat. Fors my 5 year old great.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Unsafe buckles
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! My 3.5 year old was able to very easily unlock himself from the bottom and top buckle of this seat! I’m talking like within 5 seconds of me buckling him in. He has never been able to unbuckle any other brand car seat before. I am hoping to get a refund bc this seat is completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easily to assemble and install! My toddler grandson I’d rather larger for his age, this is an excellent fit for him and he was in awe of Spidey
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Kris

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight,not hard to install.
customer_reviews.text: My son really like red when he saw it he was so excited... not heavy easy to install and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our great-nephew is a HUGE Spider-Man fan so needless to say he LOVED this seat! He feels like a big boy & yet still very safe with the harness!
customer_reviews.author: Karefull13

customer_reviews.title: BEST CARSEAT EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My great grand son LOVES this carseat! Believe me I've been through LOTS of carseats as the years go by. I also Shopped for a long time before I found this one. It's made well, easy to use and adjust and my great grandson is very comfortable in it. I also feel like he's safe in it which is a big priority. Great price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: benitarob

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is kind of obsessed with Spider Man right now. He LOVES his seat and he gets in his seat with less struggle. He even cried the first time he rode in it when it was time to get out
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Makos

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing this product. My son complains that his bottom hurts if it’s a ride longer than 10 mins and didn’t do that with his old car seat. Very difficult installation and straps will not release to fit his chest properly. It was a waste of money and time. I bought as a birthday gift and he was tickled to see spider man but hates riding in it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Turpen

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this car seat
customer_reviews.text: It all most looks like someone is sitting in the backseat when you glance at the chair. That can be a good thing. :) My 4 year old grandson likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Child loves it
customer_reviews.text: Child loooooves spiderman. Says good morning and night to it when we go in and leave the car. 2 cup holders are good
customer_reviews.author: Cierra_67

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! This is SUPER cute! My grandson son LOVES it! He face lit up when I called him downstairs so I could adjust the straps. It was very easy to put together and adjust the straps. It was a little time consuming to put in the car but I find that with most car seats. I definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

product_meta.title: KidsEmbrace 2-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat, Marvel Avengers Captain America
product_meta.description: Style:Captain AmericaYour child will love hopping into the car knowing Captain America is along for the ride! The KidsEmbrace Marvel Avengers Captain America 2-in-1 Booster Car Seat has been rigorously tested and exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213), plus it was given a "Best Bet" rating by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety. Great for toddlers and older kids alike, this combination booster car seat is approved for forward-facing use with the five-point harness for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height, and it can be converted into a belt-positioning booster car seat for boys and girls between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height. The booster seat harness straps are easy to adjust with one hand. The crotch belt can be used in two different positions to accommodate your growing child, and the headrest can be adjusted to three different heights. The headrest also features energy-absorbing EPS foam for maximum side-impact protection. The contoured seat is comfortable for long rides, and the cushioned seat cover is machine-washable for easy cleaning. Two cup holders provide a handy place for drinks, snacks, or toys. The combination five-point harness high-back booster car seat is easy to install with or without LATCH and the top tether. It measures 19-1/2 by 19 by 29-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest down) to 19-1/2 by 19 by to 32-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest up), and it weighs 15 pounds.
feature_bullets: 5-POINT HARNESS SECURITY: Two position points at each shoulder, two position points at the child's hips, and one point where the harness buckles between the legs to give your child the best possible protection
3-HARNESS POSITION: There are three slots to position the harness shoulder straps depending on the age and height of your child. Shoulder straps should be at or just above the shoulders

TWO MODE OPTIONS: Forward-facing five-point harness car seat is made for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height. Convert to a belt-positioning booster seat for older kids between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height
SAFETY CERTIFICATIONS: Insurance Institute for Highway Safety "Best Bet" rating for booster car seats; exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213)
ADDED COMFORT: Three-position adjustable height headrest is equipped with energy-absorbing EPS foam. Two cup holders provide added convenience to hold drinks or store treats and small trinkets
